name: psi-header
description: Configurable file header comment block and track last modified date/user on save.

psi-header.config.description: An optional set of global configuration options.

forceToTop.description: If true, the header is inserted at the top of the page, otherwise it is inserted at the cursor.

blankLinesAfter.description: The number of blank lines to insert after the header comment.

license.description: Identifies which license to use.  this should be either a SPDX license (refer to https://spdx.org/licenses/) or "Custom".

copyrightHolder.description: Used to identify who owns the copyright.  If not provided it defaults to the value for company if that exists.

psi-header.changes-tracking.description: An optional set of changes tracking options

isActive.description: If true, will activate changes tracking when documents are saved.  Otherwise changes tracking is not performed.

modAuthor.description: The label used to identify the template line that contains the name of the user who modified the file.

modDate.description: The label used to identify the template line that contains the date that the file was last modified.

modDateFormat.description: The date fomat string for the modified date.  Either 'date' for the standard system date (same as the 'date' placeholder) or a MomentJS format string.

include.description: An array of VSC language IDs to define which file types should be tracked.

exclude.description: An array of VSC language IDs to define which file types should not be tracked.

includeGlob.description: An array of file globs to define which files should be tracked.

excludeGlob.description: An array of file globs to define which files should not be tracked.

autoHeader.description: Setting for automatic header creation. Valid values are 'off': (default) no auto header; 'manualSave': header is added but not saved; 'autoSave': header is added and immediately saved to file.

replace.description: An array of template line prefixes that define lines that should be replaced during a save.

psi-header.license-text.description: Custom license text used where psi-header.config.license = Custom

psi-header.variables.description: An array of key value pairs that define the template variables.

psi-header.lang-config.description: An optional set of language-specific syntax settings.

language.description: The language that this entry applies to, or '*' for the default.

mapTo.description: The name of the language to copy settings from.  All other settings are ignored if this one is provided.

begin.description: The string that defines the beginning of the header comment block.

prefix.description: The string that defines the beginning of each line of the header comment block.

end.description: The string that defines the end of the header comment block.

forceToTop.description: Overrides the global setting for this language.

blankLinesAfter.description: Overrides the global setting for this language.

beforeHeader.description: Optional lines of text to be inserted before the header

afterHeader.description: Optional lines of text to be inserted after the header

rootDirFileName.description: Optional name of a file to help identify the project root directory.  This file should only be expected in the root directory.

psi-header.templates.description: An optional set of language-specific templates

language.description: The language that this entry applies to, or '*' for the default.

mapTo.description: The name of the language to copy the template from.  All other settings are ignored if this one is provided.

template.description: The template text provided as an array of strings.

changeLogCaption.description: Defines the caption for the change log and is used to identify where the change log starts.

changeLogHeaderLineCount.description: How many lines are there between the change log caption and the log items?  Useful if you want to add column headings above the items.

changeLogEntryTemplate.description: The template text for a single change log item provided as an array of strings.
